module_description: Perform database analysis on ANY database to generate the schema, and DDL.

subtasks.task: Install and test latest PostgreSQL environment with PGADMIN tool

subtasks.description: Install all the necessary drivers to connect to PostgreSQL.

subtasks.task: Test Python to PostgreSQL database connection
subtasks.description: Test Python to PostgreSQL database connection.

subtasks.task: Create simulated population health database - test
subtasks.description: Create simulated population health database for testing purposes.
Use SQL to interrogate the database and produce the schema definitions.
Discover and establish 'create table' data description language for PostgreSQL.
Develop sample SQL queries for PostgreSQL.
Perform query testing to validate the database and SQL.
